definition: Records of the Grand Historian, by 司馬遷|司马迁[Si1 ma3 Qian1], first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
surname Shi
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

History of Three Kingdoms (Korean: Samguk Sagi), the oldest extant Korean history, compiled under Kim Busik 金富軾|金富轼[Jin1 Fu4 shi4] in 1145. The three kingdoms are Goguryeo 高句麗|高句丽[Gao1 gou1 li2], Baekje 百濟|百济[Bai3 ji4], Silla 新羅|新罗[Xin1 luo2].

sentences.english: Every pratfall loss brings them closer to history.
sentences.chinese: 每一次恥辱的失敗都讓他們離那個歷史記錄更近。

sentences.english: "Notes taken in Rong Study", comments on and studies of the …
sentences.chinese: 《容齋隨筆》對《史記》人物的評論和研究。

sentences.english: History of humankind in the period before recorded history.
Sagi was born in North Tel Aviv.
sentences.chinese: 史記出生於北特拉維夫。

sentences.english: This specialized documentation is a combination of historical documentation and daily procedures.
sentences.chinese: 這個專門的文檔是歷史記錄文檔和每日過程的組合。

sentences.english: Shi Ji is a first general history of China by chronology.
sentences.chinese: 《史記》是中國第一部紀傳體通史。

sentences.english: Sagi also owns two websites for online foreign currency transactions.
sentences.chinese: 史記還擁有兩家網上外匯交易網站。

sentences.english: The local history isn't a version-control replacement.
sentences.chinese: 本地歷史記錄不能替代版本控制。

sentences.english: It handled a record number of disasters in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 2010年該局處理的災難數目突破了歷史記錄。

sentences.english: This story appears in the Historical Records Written by Sima Qian.
sentences.chinese: 這個故事載自司馬遷寫的《史記》中。

sentences.english: Make sure that the Field History Sheet is filled in accurately and submitted together with this application form.
sentences.chinese: 確保田塊歷史記錄填寫正確並且和本申請表一併提交。

sentences.english: "Notes taken in Rong Study", comments on and studies of the characters in the Records.
sentences.chinese: 《容齋隨筆》對《史記》人物的評論和研究。

sentences.english: Presence can be a status, history of activity, or location.
sentences.chinese: 存在可以是某種地位，歷史記錄，或所在位置。

sentences.english: The yellow stone old man return, the water is cool to still see stay the , the historical records your work is historic.
sentences.chinese: 黃石老人去不還，水涼猶見留侯影，史記大作炳千古。

sentences.english: An historical record of all IFSA Judges is retained and respected in the consideration of awards.
sentences.chinese: 保存好所參加過的國際比賽的歷史記錄和受獎情況。

sentences.english: The hammer price of the car broke the previous record.
sentences.chinese: 這款名車的拍賣成交價打破了此前的歷史記錄。

definition: History of the Former Han Dynasty, second of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Ban Gu 班固[Ban1 Gu4] in 82 during Eastern Han (later Han), 100 scrolls
Sima Qian (145-86 BC), Han Dynasty historian, author of Records of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4], known as the father of Chinese historiography
Zuo Zhuan or Tsochuan, Mr Zuo's Annals or Mr Zuo's commentary on 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], early history c. 400 BC attributed to famous blind historian Zuo Qiuming 左丘明[Zuo3 Qiu1 ming2]
Shijing, the Book of Songs, early collection of Chinese poems and one of the Five Classics of Confucianism 五經|五经[Wu3 jing1]
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
to write down/to record/written account
the Rites of Zhou (in Confucianism)
Zhuangzi (369-286 BC), Daoist author
The Analects of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
Classic of Rites
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
document
handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
